scripts.validate: node tools/validate.mjs --schema=core --file=examples/core-minimal.json && node tools/validate.mjs --schema=article --file=examples/article-recommended.json && node tools/validate.mjs --schema=faq --file=examples/faq.json && node tools/validate.mjs --schema=howto --file=examples/howto.json && node tools/validate.mjs --schema=howto-faq --file=examples/howto-faq.json && node tools/validate.mjs --schema=product --file=examples/product.json
